channel.title: Misc.Random()
channel.description: Could someone please explain how it works? Say Misc.Random(8) or Misc.Random(3) == 1. Thanks. In exchange for this help I shall give you my virginity.

item.title: Misc.Random()
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Alright that’s what I got from it. Thanks. I just had to read it a few times. Thread is cloased.

Read full topic

item.title: Misc.Random()
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:4, topic:373097”][quote author=Vince, link=topic=469116.msg3429693#msg3429693 date=1292216020]
misc.random(100) returns a number 0 through 100,

if(misc.random(5) == 2)
sendMessage("Random");

Means if the range from 0 to 5 is 2.
[/quote]
The last part I don’t quite comprehend. What do you mean by “means if the range from 0 -5 is 2.” Or do you mean, if it picks a random number from 0 - 5 and that number is 2? Thanks both of you.[/quote]

Was a bit sleepy still, if you put the integer 5, it will return a number 0 through 5, for example 2, if it returns two, as the if statement states, it will show the message, otherwise it will not.

Read full topic

item.title: Misc.Random()
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Vince, post:2, topic:373097”]misc.random(100) returns a number 0 through 100,

if(misc.random(5) == 2)
sendMessage("Random");

Means if the range from 0 to 5 is 2.[/quote]
The last part I don’t quite comprehend. What do you mean by “means if the range from 0 -5 is 2.” Or do you mean, if it picks a random number from 0 - 5 and that number is 2? Thanks both of you.

Read full topic

item.title: Misc.Random()
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

int type = Misc.random(1); int offset = Misc.random(distance);
For example if you had a teleport command, and the coords were 3000, 3000

Misc.random would allow the player to end up anywhere between

2999,3000 2999,2999 3000,3000 3001,2999 2999,3001 3001,3001 3000,3001 3001,3000

Read full topic
